thread.title: Bel Sees FY 2017 Sales Of $492 Million

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bel Sees FY 2017 Sales Of $492 Million
text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Bel Fuse Inc:
* BEL PROVIDES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 UPDATE * SEES FY 2017 SALES $492 MILLION * SEES Q4 2017 SALES $120 MILLION * SEES Q4 2017 SALES UP 1.2 PERCENT * - BACKLOG OF ORDERS WAS $146.5 MILLION AT DEC 31, 2017 * BEL FUSE - IMPACT OF NEW TAX LAW TO RESULT IN INCREMENTAL TAX PROVISION OF ABOUT $20 MILLION, MOSTLY ATTRIBUTABLE TO DEEMED REPATRIATION OF FOREIGN INCOME
* BEL FUSE - INCREMENTAL TAX WOULD BE RECORDED IN COâ€˜S RESULTS OF OPERATIONS DURING Q4 2017
* - ANTICIPATES TAX RATE APPLICABLE TO 2018 U.S. EARNINGS WILL BE IN RANGE OF 27% TO 29% VERSUS 38% IN 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
